title: Micah, The Fierce Toys With Emma, The Brave
description: In part 5 of this emotional series, Micah and Emma run into each other at a charity ball. Micah can’t resist pursuing Emma and confronting her about their past. Before long, their explosive chemistry takes them to new dizzying heights with a ton of primal sensuality. Emma must decide what she wants as Micah toys with her emotions. Will Micah’s fear of commitment keep them apart? The beloved Micah and Emma series will take you on a wild ride as they explore sex, love and commitment. They have many adventures and will take you to some unexpected places. Check out all of their stories from the Micah, The Fierce Takes On Emma, The Brave (Pt. 1) Micah, The Fierce Nails Emma, The Brave (Pt. 2) Micah, The Fierce Dominates Emma, The Brave (Pt.3) Micah, The Fierce Aches For Emma, The Brave (Pt. 4) Micah, The Fierce Toys With Emma, The Brave (Pt. 5)
author: Jessa Eden
